entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:03 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light early this afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
